wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Weldon Shrewsbury (born 18 January 1995 in Southampton, Hampshire) is an English cricket player. Shrewsbury is a right-arm off spin bowler who bats right-handed. Shrewsbury made his first-class debut for Gloucestershire on 2 August 2013 against Northamptonshire.
